posts.content:
Was running and driving before I started the restoration.

Car had a ticket but when I looked at the floors it never should have! So went to replace the floors only to find the body had been welded to the floor from various cheap repairs!!!

Imported from the USA in 92
Car now in project state with body split from pan.
Car is complete as I have ALL PARTS stripped from the car






Spec of the car:

    2“ Narrowed adjustable ball joint beam with dropped spindles and disc brakes all brand new
    Pan halves ready to be welded in
    Body braced ready for welding to be started
    Porsche 914 replica wheels with good tyres
    1500 IRS gearbox
    Complete interior and carpet including seats
    All Glass, door and bumpers, Replacement wiring loom
    The car has no engine


Comes with the following parts either on the car or waiting to be fitted:
    German quality track rod end outer Left hand thread 68-79
    Track rod end inner Right hand thread for short rod 68-79
    German quality track rod end Right hand thread T1 47-68 T2 55-67
    German quality track rod end Left hand thread T1 47-68 & long rod inner 47-66 T255-67
    Brand new steering box LHD or RHD T1 61-79 & Ghia 61-74
    German quality rubber steering coupling 8/65-79

    Steering damper standard beetle 8/61-77
    Complete track rods for 2 inch narrowed ball joint beam
    2 inch narrowed adjustable front Ball joint beam 8/65-4/79
    2 inch narrowed torsion leaves 8/65-4/79
    Complete front disc kit 4x130 T1 & Ghia 67-79
    Floor pan half Right 56-74
    Floor pan half Left 56-74
    German quality clutch cable 2260mm 1/63-71
    Correct fit outer sill Left 56-74
    Correct fit outer sill Right 56-74
    German quality complete heater channel Left 1/60-7/74
    German quality complete heater channel Right 1/60-7/74
    Repair for front wheel door post Left 56-74
    Repair for front wheel door post Right 56-74
    Wing section door to rear wheel Left 56-74
    Wing section door to rear wheel Right 56-74

Car has over £2300 worth of parts either on the car or waiting to be fitted to the car!
